name: UPDATE BC Icon For ROBLOX In 2016 Read Description
description:
THE BIG UPDATE IS HERE!!! :D BUILDERS CLUB PAGE WIP
1ST Anniversary!  :D

First 2023 Update. TIX On The Topbar :D

This Theme Is Based On Ologist's And A_Anthony_y's 2016 Roblox Theme but With The Other Builders Club Icons And Advanced Old Features :)
HOLY CRAP!!! 2k downloads!!! Also Thanks For Helping Me To Reach 1k+ On My Turbo Builders Club Style :)

AKA Bring Back BC Icon For Roblox

An Extension That Brings Back The BC Icon 

Perfect when Purchasing Premuim 450

NOTE: This Only Works for themes like roblox in 2016 or old 2019 light theme stuff like that
and this is my first extension in stylish.
 

Check Out The TBC one https://userstyles.org/styles/198624/bring-back-tbc-icon-for-roblox

OBC Icon 
 https://userstyles.org/styles/210116/obc-icon-for-roblox

Link to roblox in 2016 extenstion used in the background
https://userstyles.org/styles/178105/roblox-in-2016
additional_info:
Credit Goes To Ologist For The Original Theme 
 
Credit Goes To A_Anthony_y For The Features

I Will Keep The 2016 Theme Since everyone Misses Nostalgic Roblox!

For Another
If You Report Any Bugs On The Theme Let me Know and I'll Be Happy To Fix Them! :D

discussions.name: Thank u! :D I Hope You Enjoyed BC Being Back!
